title: RH Could Break Out to New Highs Following Earnings
text:
RH ( RH ) is due to report its latest earning's figures Tuesday. Let's visit with the charts and indicators to see if the current rally can continue going.

In this daily bar chart of RH, below, we can see that prices have regained their March levels in just three months. Pretty amazing. RH is above the rising 50-day moving average line and the rising 200-day line too. Last month the 50-day line crossed above the 200-day line for a bullish golden cross.

The On-Balance-Volume (OBV) line has been rising since early June to confirm the advance as it signals more aggressive buying.

The Moving Average Convergence Divergence (MACD) oscillator is turning to the upside for a fresh go long signal.

In this weekly bar chart of RH, below, most of the price gaps disappear and we can see the larger picture with prices in an $85 to $160 trading band.

RH is above the rising 40-week moving average line and the weekly OBV line is leading the price action with its new high in the past month.

The MACD oscillator is in a bullish configuration above the zero line.

In this Point and Figure chart of RH, below, we can see that prices have broken out to a new high for the move up and a $183 price target is being projected.

Bottom line strategy: With an upside target of $183 and bullish looking charts, it looks like traders and investors could see RH make new highs above $160. Raise stops to a close below $138.
description: RH reports its second quarter results on Tuesday....RH
authors: Rh Could Break Out To New Highs Following Earnings
Rh Reports Its Second Quarter Results On Tuesday.
